definition: complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: This harbour teemed with oceangoing commerce.
sentences.chinese: 这一海港曾经有繁盛的海外贸易。

sentences.english: Industry and trade with foreign countries became prosperous, woolen cloth was on sale in European countries.
sentences.chinese: 城市手工业和对外贸易都相当繁盛，呢绒行销欧洲。

sentences.english: The Tang Dynasty was a blooming period of women′s toilette, especially in painting eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 唐代是妇女妆饰十分繁盛的一个时期，尤以眉妆为最。

sentences.english: Tavira used to be a place devoted to the tuna fishing.
sentences.chinese: 塔维拉曾经就是以金枪鱼捕捞业而繁盛一时的地区。

sentences.english: And quite possibly there would be a flourishing of creative and philosophical thought.
sentences.chinese: 而且很可能会出现一个创造和哲学思想的繁盛时期。

sentences.english: The first part discusses the reason why the anti-corruption novel rises and grows prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分论述反腐小说兴起和繁盛的原因。

sentences.english: “It’s like a samurai boom,” says a curator at the local museum.
sentences.chinese: 当地博物馆的馆长说“这就像一个武士的时代的繁盛。

sentences.english: But when that ancient continent broke up, life got lusher .
sentences.chinese: 但是，当这一古老的大陆解体时，生命变得更加繁盛。

sentences.english: Oh the balmy days and palmy days.
sentences.chinese: 哦那些芳香的繁盛的日子。

sentences.english: The times of Kublai Khan was the mature and flourishing period of Kublai Khan Yuan Zaju.
sentences.chinese: 忽必烈时代是元杂剧成熟并繁盛的时期。

sentences.english: But beyond the glow of this sudden efflorescence , a housing bubble had begun to form.
sentences.chinese: 但在突如其来繁盛的光辉之外，房市泡沫开始形成。

sentences.english: Colonies that were once thriving suddenly went still, almost overnight.
sentences.chinese: 一度繁盛的蜂群几乎在一夜之间突然消失殆尽。

sentences.english: There are five main historical reasons for the prevalence of sexual love literature during Ming & Qing dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 明清艳情文学繁盛的历史原因主要表现在五个方面。

sentences.english: Summer brimmed over the sky, and sunshine reached out her arms everywhere to the top of her bent.
sentences.chinese: 那些天空里匆忙盛开的夏天，阳光有了最繁盛的拔节。

sentences.english: The period of literary and artistic efflorescence has come.
sentences.chinese: 文艺创作的繁盛时期已经来到。

sentences.english: it was because of human behavior that the rats were thriving.
sentences.chinese: 是人类的行为让老鼠繁盛兴旺。
